tdd:
ignore:
  - "message"
  - "host"
testcases:

  - description: "Standard apache log parsing"
    input:
      - "1.2.3.4 - - [30/Apr/1998:22:00:52 +0000] \\\"GET /english/venues/cities/images/montpellier/18.gif HTTP/1.0\\\" 200 3171"
    expected:
      - type: "apache"
        request: "/english/venues/cities/images/montpellier/18.gif"
        auth: "-"
        ident: "-"
        verb: "GET"
        size: 3171
        clientip: "1.2.3.4"
        httpversion: "1.0"
        status: "200"
        "@timestamp": "1998-04-30T22:00:52.000Z"
